page.title: 04Customs in Pennington
page.content: Our village does not have any special custom such as rush bearing like in some places,but many people take part in village galas.Our village does not have a gala,but there is one in Ulverston and we join in that. Lots of girls go to the dancing troupes in the winter and in the summer they go to all the galas in the other places.They wear all sorts of costumes, a different one each year, and dance different dances. I have been a clown, a majorette, a milkmaid and a ballerina. Our dancing troupe has been to galas in Ulverston, Grange-over-Sands, Askam and Dalton. My mum makes a lot of the costumes because she is good at sewing. I am allowed to help her now because she says I am big enough to start using the sewing machine.
